name: Mushy Express
description:
Help out your community by delivering mail to every mushroom and earn your rightful vacation!

This is for  https://itch.io/jam/wholesome-games-jam-2022

Controls;

WS to move, shift to move faster, LMB to throw mail, E to buy items, press esc to escape the game
